name: Growing Apart (Sam Grant)
description:
Growing up away from home can be difficult. Homesickness, feeling lost and like you don't belong. Now imagine you are a plucked potted plant, pinched from your home and grown on the window sill. In this game you will take our potted, petal friend on a journey back home! but watch out! the cracks in your pot are leaking and escaping wont be that easy! Find your way through the maze-like homes of the giant humans, in search for water and solace.

A Global Game Jam 2021 Submission. 

Team: 

Jordan Douglas: 3D Artist, Josh Marsh: Level Designer, Sam Grant: Designer/ Programmer
